entry.title: From The First Step, To Always
entry.summary:
Author: IrishMum1710

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,180Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 2

Summary: When celebrity chef Evan ‚ÄúBuck‚Äù Buckley signs on for Dancing with the Stars, he expects chaos, cameras, and a steep learning curve. What he doesn‚Äôt expect is Eddie D√≠az ‚Äî a disciplined, exacting professional dancer whose control is as precise as Buck‚Äôs energy is unruly. Paired together for the season, Buck and Eddie clash immediately: chaos versus control, feeling versus technique. Rehearsals are messy, frustrating, and unexpectedly electric. As Buck learns the steps and Eddie learns to loosen his grip, their partnership becomes something deeper ‚Äî built on trust, patience, and the quiet promise of never letting the other fall. Set against the glitter, pressure, and intimacy of the ballroom floor, this is a story about learning to move together ‚Äî and choosing each other, from the first step to always.

entry.title: magic and guardian angels

Author: xachery_apollo

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,112Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 20

Summary: He‚Äôs standing next to his best friend, the love of his life. They work quietly and perfectly in sync. It‚Äôs so domestic, it gives him a fuzzy feeling. His walls are usually so strong, but not tonight. Without realizing it, he lets his magic flow from him, flow through his home, around the people in it. Buck gasps and drops a plate in the sink.-------Buck and Eddie have been keeping their magic from each other while trying to use it to protect the team

entry.title: The Answer To Every 'What If'
entry.summary:
Author: cadburystories

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,590Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 12

Summary: After Bobby's death, Evan Buckley falls into a spiral of guilt, grief and despair. Coming back to LA for the funerals, Eddie sees Buck's pain and tries deal with it but it doesn't go quite as planned... Out of concern for his best friend, but also because he misses home, Eddie decides to move back to LA and stay with Buck until he is better. How will that go for them? Will feelings finally surface? Is there going to be a realization on one or both parties?

entry.title: This Town Can‚Äôt Get Smaller
entry.summary:
Author: StarOfTheStratosphere

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,416Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Eddie Diaz loves teaching English, each story has something to talk about. He teaches, he cooks dinner (but mostly orders take out), and tries his hardest in being the best dad to his son. Especially since Shannon has passed away. Meanwhile, Buck moves into town, a humorous yet efficient firefighter that ignites the town into being the hot topic. Eddie is intrigued, and he sees him everywhere. Unplanned, a blonde patch of curls, and a ridiculous amount of legs. OR: Eddie teaches AP Lang, and Buck is a firefighter! They fall in love, eventually, while Shannon and Catholicism haunt him.

entry.title: desperate times (slutty measures)
entry.summary:
Author: madforyou

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,388Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 143

Summary: "Dad." Chris looks up. "Dad, please tell me this isn't actually you. Please tell me you have a secret twin or something." Eddie frowns. "What isn't me?" "This." Chris shoves his phone across the table, nearly knocking over Eddie's water glass in the process. Eddie catches it before it can slide into his plate and looks at the screen. It's TikTok, which Eddie barely understands despite Chris's many patient attempts to explain it to him. There's a video playing on loop and the quality is terrible but Eddie recognizes his kitchen immediately. Those floor-to-ceiling windows he'd been so excited about when he first saw the apartment. The window with the busted blinds he keeps meaning to replace. His couch. That‚Äôs definitely his couch. And yeah, okay, that's definitely him, shirtless, wearing the stupid cowboy hat that his buddy from his new firehouse gave him as a welcome-to-the-team gift. That‚Äôs him. Cooking dinner. In full view of his massive windows. For apparently the entire internet to see. "Oh my god," Eddie says faintly. Or,A crash course in accidental thirst traps and the soulmates they attract.

entry.title: The Long Way Back
entry.summary:
Author: DramamineOnTopOfMe

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,294Chapters: 4/26Kudos: 9

Summary: Buck never thought he‚Äôd have to balance the line between looking like he‚Äôd gotten enough sleep and just having the worst night of his life. Concealer over the bags under his eyes, a hint of color so no one asks questions. When Eddie left for Texas, Maddie asked if he‚Äôd be okay. Buck said it was just a cold. A year of distance changes things. Calls turn into texts. Silence becomes safer than honesty. Physical closeness helps in ways neither of them want to examine too closely, and loving each other starts to look a lot like coping. Coming back doesn‚Äôt fix anything. It just makes the truth harder to avoid.

entry.title: Brown eyes
entry.summary:
Author: Nazz1987

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,647Chapters: 4/16Kudos: 14

Summary: Diego gave him a big sweet smile and for a second Buck lost control and his gaze landed upon the other's lips. Quickly realizing he was being challenged at a staring competition and went back to were he was. The guitar player break the game with a smile like a white flag on the horizon and took a swing of his drink. "I'm gonna warn you if you look at me like that again i might try to kiss you" and a cheeky smile tugged at Diego's mouth. Buck mirrored his face and leaned a bit closer "If you're asking for consent you already have it" and winked at him. They stayed still for a few beats, their faces were really close. Diego's eyes became darker and without loosing more time he closed their distance with a soft and sweet kiss. --- Or, Buck meets a new guy and starts dating. Eddie struggles with who he is and what he wants. This is after the opening emergency of S9. I promise a happy Buddie ending but a lot of things will happen in between!

entry.title: you called me home
entry.summary:
Author: thequeenofwhump

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,561Chapters: 8/14Kudos: 329

Summary: Running to the frontlines from a childhood he never had. Taking a bat to the wall with his son in the next room. Having an affair with the spitting image of his dead wife. Eddie knows he‚Äôs never been good at grieving, knows he‚Äôs never been good at losing what little he allows for himself in the first place. This is why he also knows his coping mechanisms can‚Äôt possibly get any worse. Buck, as he so often does, makes him reevaluate his assumptions.‚ÄîEvan Buckley dies behind a wall of glass. It‚Äôs a shame that when he‚Äôs revived not three minutes later, no one is informed.

entry.title: we'll do the things that lovers do
entry.summary:
Author: MacksDramaticShenanigans

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,587Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 218

Summary: ‚ÄúHey,‚Äù Buck says, nudging Eddie with his elbow. He tips his chin towards the toothbrush in Eddie‚Äôs hands. ‚ÄúGimme that when you‚Äôre done.‚Äù Eddie pauses, the circular motions of his brushing coming to a halt. The toothbrush stays wedged between his teeth. His mouth still hangs open. ‚ÄúUh,‚Äù he says, and toothpaste trickles from the corner of his mouth. ‚ÄúMy toothbrush?‚Äù Except ‚Äî it comes out more like muh too bruh? Buck snorts, chest glowing warm, and nods. ‚ÄúYeah, what else?‚Äù Eddie‚Äôs brow wrinkles, and his nose scrunches. ‚ÄúUh, no?‚Äù He replies. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs gross.‚Äù

entry.title: Catch Me, Please
entry.summary:
Author: ALittleSideProject

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,913Chapters: 8/34Kudos: 82

Summary: And all of that was why, on their seventeenth day on Mars, Buck had shoved Eddie out of the way during the emergency evacuation, knowing it meant his own death instead of Eddie‚Äôs. Buck trusted Eddie to help get everyone else home, and Eddie had someone to go home for. Someone who needed him and loved him. Someone who Buck loved, even without ever meeting. He wasn‚Äôt going to let Chris grow up without a father. So in the split second he had to think after seeing the communications dish flying at them through the storm that was chasing them off the planet fourteen days early, he‚Äôd pushed Eddie out of the way, hoping like hell it would be enough and knowing he wouldn‚Äôt live long enough to find out. -- Or, take the basic plot of The Martian and stick the 911 characters in there, slap on a lot more angst and pining, and wrap it all up with plenty of recovery cuddling. | Fic is complete at ~120k words and posting 2-3x a week as I edit.

entry.title: tooth and nail
entry.summary:
Author: WabiSabiPapi

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,070Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 120

Summary: The air crackles all around them as their heavy breaths consume the silence of the otherwise empty house. Into Eddie‚Äôs ear, Buck murmurs, ‚ÄúYou aren‚Äôt leaving.‚Äù Breathless and voice straining, Eddie chuckles darkly. ‚ÄúThere he is.‚Äù Carefully, Buck wrangles Eddie‚Äôs hands behind his back so he can lock the deadbolt. Sensing the weakened hold, Eddie thrashes, but Buck quickly knocks him against the door again. ‚ÄúAre you gonna let me do this?‚Äù ‚ÄúWhat aren‚Äôt you getting?‚Äù Eddie counters, his cheek squashed against the door, still fighting it, not letting up. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt let anyone do anything.‚Äù ¬† Buck wants to apologize, wants everything to go back to normal, but Eddie won't talk to him. He barely even looks at him. Maybe it's time for some drastic measures.
